arts.ttl: Everton end winless run with victory over Fulham
arts.sum: Goals from Idrissa Gueye and Michael Keane help Everton end their three-match winless run with a 2-0 win over Fulham at the Hill Dickinson Stadium.

Maybe last weekend’s win over Wolverhampton Wanderers was a false dawn. Fulham, with Marco Silva and Alex Iwobi returning to their former employers, should have been fired up to pull away from the wrong end of the Premier League table. Silva shuffled his side around but they had no answer to Everton’s intensity, desire and […]

arts.ttl: David Moyes hails ‘fantastic’ Everton signing following Fulham win
arts.sum: David Moyes praised Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall for his “fantastic” contribution to Everton’s campaign thus far following victory over Fulham on Saturday. The Toffees had three goals disallowed at the Hill Dickinson Stadium, but came away with all three points regardless thanks to goals from Idrissa Gana Gueye and Michael Keane. It’s the first time Everton have […] The post David Moyes hails ‘fantastic’ Everton signing following Fulham win first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Fulham 'got what we deserved' with Everton defeat - Silva
arts.sum: Fulham manager Marco Silva says he and his team "got what we deserved" as they suffered a 2-0 defeat at Everton in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Everton boss David Moyes praises striker Thierno Barry after beating Fulham
arts.sum: Idrissa Gueye and Michael Keane got the goals for the Toffees but Barry impressed Moyes.

arts.ttl: Everton defeat Fulham in sorry Merseyside return for Silva
arts.sum: Goals in either half from Gueye and Keane give hosts 2-0 win at the Hill Dickinson Stadium

arts.ttl: Moyes emulates Wenger, Ferguson feat as Everton ease past Fulham
arts.sum: Everton head coach David Moyes joins Arsene Wenger and Sir Alex Ferguson in an exclusive managerial club as he leads the Toffees to a 2-0 Premier League win at home to Fulham.

arts.ttl: Everton vs Fulham Player Ratings: Kiernan Dewsbury-Hall inspires Toffees’ win on home soil
arts.sum: The Blues return ended their three-game winless run with a victory on home soil over Fulham.

arts.ttl: Everton return to winning ways as Fulham falter
arts.sum: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights of the Premier League match between Everton and Fulham.

arts.ttl: Idrissa Gueye and Michael Keane on target as Everton sink Fulham
arts.sum: Everton ended a run of three games without a win with a 2-0 victory over Fulham at Hill Dickinson Stadium
